synopsis.text:
Will ing to immerse yourself in a thrilling, futuristic adventure? Set in the city of Xenon in the year 2097, this anime introduces a groundbreaking cyber game where players engage in intense battles as bio-mechanical robots. However, the line between the virtual world and reality begins to blur when the damages inflicted in the game manifest in the real world, wreaking havoc in Xenon. The mysterious connection between the two realms is marked by an eerie scream, a ghostly apparition of a young girl, and an overpowering lemon scent.

To unravel this enigma, the game's creator brings together the top three gamers in Xenon, forming a 'Dream Team' of rebellious and arrogant teenagers. As they navigate their attitudes and fears, the team embarks on a mission to uncover the truth behind the link between the game and reality. With the stakes higher than they ever imagined, can they solve the mystery before it's too late? Join the Dream Team on their extraordinary journey and discover the secrets that lie beyond the game.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
